from the Download Mods tab.

settings.animation_label: Controls the particle animation in the main window's background.

info.title: About ZERO Mod Manager
info.description: ZMM is a tool designed to facilitate the installation and management of mods for the game DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO. It allows you to install mods manually, download them directly from GameBanana, manage mod profiles, and activate or deactivate modding with a single click.
info.thanks_message: I'm delighted to create tools like this for the community. I want to give a special thanks to all of GameBanana for being an incredible platform that inspires creators around the world.
info.donation_title: If you like my work, consider supporting me:

download_tab.no_mods_found: No mods found with the applied filters.
